title: Sources: Knicks interested in speaking with Kidd
description: The New York Knicks are conducting active due diligence on Dallas Mavericks coach Jason Kidd among other head coaching candidates in their search to replace Tom Thibodeau, sources told ESPN.
author: Shams Charania and Tim MacMahon

title: Sinner beats Djokovic, advances to French final
description: Top seed Jannik Sinner advanced to the French Open final by defeating No. 6 seed Novak Djokovic 6-4, 7-5, 7-6 (3) in Friday's semifinal.
author: ESPN News Services

title: Why 'the game is about glory' has a hollow ring at Spurs
description: Ange Postecoglou's sacking shows the old Spurs saying "the game is about glory" does not count under chairman Daniel Levy, says chief football writer Phil McNulty.

title: The cracks at Spurs that Europa League glory could not hide
description: An in-depth look at why Tottenham sacked Ange Postecoglou 16 days after their Europa League success.

title: 'Our worst PL finish' - Spurs sack Postecoglou despite Europa glory
description: Tottenham have sacked head coach Ange Postecoglou despite winning the Europa League to end the club's 17-year trophy drought.

title: How 'destructive' Delap can bring the best out of Palmer and Chelsea
description: "I was sick of getting the ball and going backwards or sideways," said Cole Palmer about Chelsea's Conference League final contest with Real Betis. And then he took the game by the scruff of the neck.

title: NBA Finals ratings: Pacers-Thunder thriller posts worst Game 1 numbers since league's COVID-19 downturn
description: Game 1's ratings were down 18% from last year's Celtics-Mavericks NBA Finals.
author: Jack Baer

title: CB Jalen Ramsey named top trade target for Arizona Cardinals
description: Pro Football Network believes the Cardinals should trade for Dolphins CB Jalen Ramsey.
